title: Understanding Certificate Authorities
text: A certificate authority (CA) is a trusted entity that issues digital certificates. These certificates are used to verify the identity of entities on the internet.

title: Role of Certificate Authorities
text: Certificate authorities play a crucial role in securing communications over the internet by providing a way to verify the authenticity of websites and other entities.

hintAnswer: an authority who issues a digital certificate, including a commercial entity, a network administrator, or even yourself
title: Identifying a Certificate Authority
text: Which of the following best describes a certificate authority?
choices: an authority who issues a digital certificate, including a commercial entity, a network administrator, or even yourself
